languages.text: When the wearer of this badge gains a stack of versatility, they also gain +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.

traits.locale_text: (draft) When the wearer gains each stack of Right Tool for the Job, they gain 3 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}Momentum{/g}.

languages.text: 每当装备者获得1层“多才多艺”效果时，额外获得+3{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}。
languages.original_text: When the wearer of this badge gains a stack of versatility, they also gain +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者获得1层“合适装备”效果时，额外获得+3{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}士气{/g}。

languages.text: このバッジの着用者が汎用性を1スタック得ると、{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}も+3される。
languages.original_text: When the wearer of this badge gains a stack of versatility, they also gain +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.

traits.locale_text: このバッジの着用者が仕事に適したツールを1スタック得ると、{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}推進力{/g}も+3される。

languages.text: Cuando el portador de esta insignia obtiene una acumulación de Versatilidad, también gana +3 de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the wearer of this badge gains a stack of versatility, they also gain +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el portador de esta insignia obtiene una acumulación de Herramienta adecuada, también gana +3 de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}ímpetu{/g}.

languages.text: Wenn der Träger dieses Abzeichens einen Stapel Vielseitigkeit erhält, steigt auch seine {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g} um +3.
languages.original_text: When the wearer of this badge gains a stack of versatility, they also gain +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Wenn der Träger dieses Abzeichens eine Einheit von Das richtige Werkzeug für den Job erhält, steigt auch seine {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}Dynamik{/g} um +3.

languages.text: Получая уровень эффекта "универсальность", персонаж также получает +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментума{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the wearer of this badge gains a stack of versatility, they also gain +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Получая уровень эффекта "подходящий способ", персонаж также получает +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}моментума{/g}.

languages.text: Lorsque l'utilisateur de cet insigne acquiert un cumul de Versatilité, il bénéficie également de +3 points de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}fougue{/g}.
